# Data & Methods

```{r packages}

library(tidyverse)
library(haven)

```


```{r import-data}
# Load National LIHTC data
lihtc <- read_csv('../data/LIHTCPUB.CSV')

lihtc <-  lihtc %>% 
  filter((yr_alloc >= 2003) & (yr_alloc <= 2019)) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(dda))

dda_sites <- lihtc %>%
  group_by(proj_st, yr_alloc) %>% 
  summarise(y= sum(dda==1)/n())

ctcac <- lihtc %>% 
  filter(proj_st == 'CA')

ggplot(data = dda_sites) +
  geom_line(mapping = aes(
    x=yr_alloc, 
    y = y, 
    group=proj_st,
    color = proj_st))
  

```
